You still have many English Premier League live matches to watch

In addition, don’t forget to check the NFL schedule to watch your favorite team!

Worry about spending quality time at home with kids on the weekend? Say no more!
Play “Sofa Kuning”, sing along and learn together.

Update your Mola TV apps to enjoy a better watching experience now!

P.S. iOS 14 Support

“Hard times fall upon everybody. Whatever it is, we’re going to get out of it” -Mike Tyson, The Legend-

We’re inspired to help you out of hard times. With our 1.9.1, we’ve done a lot of bug fixing. Enjoy our Mola Living for its amazing opportunity to watch Live QnA session with Mike Tyson, hosted by our Former Minister of Marine Affairs and Fisheries, Susi Pudjiastuti.

Continue watching other favorite shows in our HBO Go section afterwards.

Update Mola Tv apps & get a better watching experience!

YOU’RE INVITED!

Dear All Crewmates,

Let’s take some times to slow down for awhile & remember some good stories in your life, be it about:
- Getting your first job
- Sharing laughter with folks & family, or simply
- Watching your favorite football match (OK, I got your attention)

In 1.9.3, I give you the “REMINDER” feature, just to make sure you remember your upcoming favorite match[es] be easy-peasy lemon squeezy. Find it on video detail and don’t miss it!
Update now.

Sincerely,
Someone Behind the Door Log.

What's New in 1.16.0

-We create more comfortable watching experience by shortening and repositioning the video fingerprint
-Refresh your hectic days with our new programme: Mola Chill Friday. The one and only live music, performed by local and international musician brought to you on Friday night.

What's New in 1.19.0

- You can clear your videos from continue watching list, so it could be replaced with the latest video collection
- Experience watching with more clear view with zoom to fill feature
- We add bunch of top documentary movies and series to watch on Mola Movies
- Bug fixes and improvements


Keep updated and happy watching!
